description: This is a single room with a view of the beach or mountains, depending on the location.
This is a double room with modern amenities and a balcony overlooking the ocean.
This is a family room with a large living area and a separate dining area. The room has a balcony overlooking the ocean
This is a king room comprising of a large living area, a separate dining area, and a large balcony overlooking the ocean.
This is a twin room offering numerous amenities and a balcony overlooking the city
This is a studio room with modern amenities and a balcony overlooking the ocean.
